body_html: I am training on benchmarks and I am comparing this resnet with slim resnet. In benchmarks, epoch time using NCHW is 15 hours. In slim, epoch time using NHWC is 17 hours, but using NCHW epoch time is 22 hours.
body_text: I am training on benchmarks and I am comparing this resnet with slim resnet. In benchmarks, epoch time using NCHW is 15 hours. In slim, epoch time using NHWC is 17 hours, but using NCHW epoch time is 22 hours.
body: I am training on benchmarks and I am comparing this resnet with slim resnet. In benchmarks, epoch time using NCHW is 15 hours. In slim, epoch time using NHWC is 17 hours, but using NCHW epoch time is 22 hours.
